website_summaries.verdict: It trades in some features for price, but this is a reliable helmet headset.
pros: Installs easily into full helmets and pairs quickly
Control buttons are robust and responsive
Phone conversations are clear, with no road noise cluttering voice
cons: Charging may fail after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Seriously don’t waste your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the intercom for me and my wife on a street glide. Install was a piece of cake. Quality is excellent. Sound quality is very good and the cool thing is when you are up intercom and have gps or a call on your phone it automatically switches back and forth with it and each rider hears tones so you don’t have to worry about switching back and forth. Trust me. These are worth it
customer_reviews.author: SIMON G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a second set for visiting family. Nearly as good as my much more expensive set. Sound quality is great except no auto volume adjust for outside noise. Range is very good. Battery life seems good. A little bulky, perhaps, and mounting isn't perfect, but it gives you options of clip-on vs. permanent. The curve in the permanent mount doesn't fit my helmet, but a hammer and punch might fix that. I'm giving 5 stars because, while not perfect, at this price point it's dang good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Welburn

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality. The actual headset look and feel much better than the picture shown. The pairing was simple. Only took me less than 10 min. to get both headset paired and ready for use. The sound quality is fairly decent for the price being more than half off some of the name brand out there. I have a 3/4 helmet and the sound was still loud enough to hear. But have to have the visor down to able to talk. I guess that would be standard for all headset..LOL. I would recommend this headset for anyone. Good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Jai

customer_reviews.title: The sound it's too bright in the middle and high frequency to enjoy music nicely.
customer_reviews.text: The sound it's too bright in the middle and high frequency to enjoy music nicely. No bass pretty much. other than that it works great. it functional, looks good. the clip is good enough, no need to stick if you doing want or have multiple helmets. it links good to my iPhone, but no hey Siri available. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Manlio Corradi

customer_reviews.title: Good product if you understand its quirks.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these work well. Double click to launch Google Assistant or Siri. Button combinations are a bit confusing unless you use the unit frequently enough. Knowing exactly when an intercom connection has been made isn't obvious, and if listening to the FM radio when the other person starts an intercom session with you, the radio doesn't mute. The good is that the buttons are big and easy to find and use with winter gloves on, and it uses non proprietary micro USB for charging and 3.5mm audio.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah & Lewis Wollen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a basic intercom set up for my wife and I to use on our side by side trips and really don't care about the other functionality. They worked perfectly for what we wanted. Sound was crystal clear. We could hear each other well but best when the full face part of the helmet was flipped down, mostly because the machine is so noisy. Easy to set up and well worth the money. Highly recommended for a quality, cost effective basic intercom system.
customer_reviews.author: Dave  R

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have used it for phone calls and music mostly and I must say Ill take this over any overpriced sena or cardo everytime. Crystal clear mic and speaker sound quality is better than anticipated although not top of the line. Allows some road sound if wanted, which is nice because I don't want to be 100% isolated from road noise. Also has FM receiver built in which is awesome. Haven't tried intercom yet but I don't think I'll use that feature much anyway. Changing songs, pausing music and turning on/off is super easy and simplifies the phone situation on the bike alot. Forget headphones... Buy this
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jackowski

customer_reviews.title: Works, eh......price point is a little high for them still
customer_reviews.text: Wide open area snowmobiling we get about 50 yards before it scrambles and then starts producing a nice annoying noise, between touching heads and that they work ok, noise cancellation is nonexistent except if you make it past the annoying noise at 50 yards and it just goes quiet or you get away from another person's engine noise. Sound quality is equitable to a cheap pair of over the ear headphones that came with a cd player in 1999. Battery life is a good though
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this unit a number of months ago, based on reviews. I wasn't expecting bose quality sound but, the tinny, muffled audio from this unit is absolutely terrible. I couldn't believe just how bad it was, and figured it had to be the speakers. I plugged the speakers directly into my iphone, and it still sounded like crap. I followed up by plugging a known good pair of speakers into the unit, and that sounded like crap as well. I even had my wife listen with consecutive speakers on my iphone, then the unit, and she just shook her head in disappointment. Into the garbage. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Hearing music is fine . But u still can’t talk on it cause u can’t hear . Bout time I got up to about 30 mph I couldn’t hear the person talking . Got up to like 60 mph and music was still good and loud . I’ll be returning n trying another one
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: T10 Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I like to drive my girlfriend out with a motorcycle, and with it I can communicate better when I drive a motorcycle. Easy to install, you can communicate with each other via Bluetooth. You can use Bluetooth headsets to answer phones, listen to radio and music. The voice is very clear, very good product, I like.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Just used once
customer_reviews.text: So obviously can't judge durability. But sound is one of best headsets I have heard. Also like the way clip attaches to helmet..well 2.5 weeks later during good rain this device wouldn't connect then when it did it would redial voicemail constantly until power turned off...shame I liked it until today but a bluetooth that canycgsndle rain is as much use as a politician at a real job
customer_reviews.author: tiredofbs4

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Sena brand to me
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice for the price. I also have a $200 sena headset. This one gets louder than it. I was hoping to link the 2 different headsets together but was unable to. I installed it into a dual sport helmet and it worked great for music or gps directions. Connected to my phone easily and battery life was good.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: On the road
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were easy to understand. When we used them at home you could hear and speak very clearly. When we were on the road I kept setting the volume higher., but was hard to hear with road noise. Don't get me wrong you were able to hear, just not as loud as I would have preferred. All in all we are very happy with the set. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I have used as a telephone and intercom, both which work very well. Even still, I cannot get hands free calling to work with my iPhone, and switching between phone and intercom can be problematic while you are riding.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carr

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth stoped charging ive used it for less than 2 months ... It golds the charge for a long time tho in the time i used it i charged it like 5 times.. it has not gotten wet or nothing.. the piece that comes with tape to have it "permanently" glued is a piece of garvage had to use another glue. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Awesome setup for the price... works great from rider to passenger, bluetooth for music works great, sound is way better than i expected, calls are great (no one knows im on the bike during calls). As far as rider to rider, i only used it once so far but it worked ok. Battery life is really good and varies upon what you use them for. Have held up through multiple rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for Christmas so he could use it while on his snowmobile trips with his grandpa. He absolutely loves loved them! Even Grandpa who was skeptical at first (old school fella) ended up liking them and commented on how nice quality they are. That’s saying a lot! Five stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: For the price - solid.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s awesome. Links 3 people the Bluetooth comm is clear and works good, at least the 3 times I’ve used that function. Plays music and sounds okay. I can’t expect big sound out of small speakers. The controls are easy to use. I’ve onmy had it disconnect from the phone when I paused it and required me to restart the music from the phone, which I keep in my pocket. The charge lasted a long time before needing a refresh. I know some of the bigger brands can link up to 10 riders but I don’t want that much chatter.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: great quality works very good
customer_reviews.text: impressed with this communication system. installed easily in our helmets and paired without issue. sound is very clear and no interference. wind noise is at a minimum. definitely recommend this unit. works just as well or better than others costing twice as much. built in FM radio was a surprise addition.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some music to listen to while I ride my snowmobile and this bluetooth set works perfectly. The speakers stick right inside my helmet and the bluetooth device attaches right to the side of my helmet. It pairs easily with my i-pod and the battery lasted all day with temp. being around 0. I can adjust volume and skip or play back a song easily with my gloves on crusing down the trail. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works well at highway speed but the speakers are a little tinny. Wish it had more bass. Have not exhausted the battery. Typically ride is 45 min session and I have not charged it for 4 rides.
customer_reviews.author: sphinx

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This works well, especially for the price. I have broken one of the speakers moving the system from my old helmet to my new helmet. it was definitely my fault for not being careful. I would like to purchase a replacement speaker/ microphone set but I haven't found one yet.
customer_reviews.author: C.Power

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery, can’t beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away with just how practical this thing was. I use it every time I ride to listen to Pandora from my phone and podcasts as well. It also has an FM radio feature which works OK, there is some static on certain stations. Bluetooth calling is flawless from my experience. The battery lasts me a whole week of use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: stick pad not the best had had stick problems with one receiver
customer_reviews.text: I like them and at a good price point, wife and I can hear each other on intercom real well while driving our razor 1000 turbo at high speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Brumm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This wireless communication headset is wonderful. It is the perfect headset that I got it for my motorcycle. It supports me and my friend for our hands-free group call communication. It also easy to install to my motorcycle and place it. I took it to my trip with my friend, the communication connection range is very long. But the sound quality still very clearly. I like it so much. Thanks. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Jayson jiang

customer_reviews.title: Not a good setup
customer_reviews.text: Did not sit in the helmet very well. Sound quality was not good. The piece that controls everything did not fit my helmet and the tape that was provided did not work. It fell off my first 3 miles.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for about a week. So far the call quality is good and the speakers are fairly loud. Haven't tried the intercom yet. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this bluetooth set.
customer_reviews.text: The headset was easy to install which was great. Battery life seems to be pretty good, but the wire that connects the speakers near the ears to the actual Bluetooth device is super finicky and I can only hear out of them half of the time. The wire has to be in the exact right position otherwise I just hear static. Would not recommend :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install battery doesn't last long speakers are a little weak but for the money you really can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because at highway speeds it is difficult to understand someone in a phone call, but great for the price and does the job very well. Great sound quality for music or phone calls at low speeds. (In a full face helmet)
customer_reviews.author: P. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Great coms
customer_reviews.text: Use for riding the utv/atv trails in full face helmets. Never a problem with hearing each other. Even with visors up there is no wind noise. Would buy again in a heart beat so we can communicate with others we ride with. Thumbs up all the way. Best buy for the money in our books. Have used them for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: MommaNub

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 5 year old and I when we go our riding on our UTV. So happy with this purchase. We have so much fun. We have used these for two days without charging. I would like to get more for my whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've now had these for 6 months and no problems. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets. First one came out the box with a busted speaker. Could not get the unit or the speakers to stick. They literally fell off sitting on the shelf. Would not waste you time on these.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but they work
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap helmet communicators. They work fine for what you pay for them. Sound quality and noise cancelling- NOT. The radio works but would drive an audiophile crazy. At 1/5 the cost of a pair of Sena there not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chris Gammack

customer_reviews.title: Speakers junk
customer_reviews.text: Used it outside the helmet and it worked fine. Installed and they sounded like blown speakers. Went with Cardo and not looking back.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great communicator for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best sound quality but the clear sound when you use it 1-1. Can hear with no prob if the speed/wind below 70MPH without a taller windscreen. Would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Vera S

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: I would have no reservations in purchasing again. I bought a 2pack and will be buying another. I use them to talk to my boy while riding dirt bikes. He can be way out of sight and it's still crystal clear. Two thumbs up on these.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Matamales

customer_reviews.title: Very good noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: We use it when i ride along with my son. Pretty good noise canceling. Very clear audio. Easy to use with gloves. Reasonable cost
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanBoy

customer_reviews.title: Easily breaks.
customer_reviews.text: The clip fell apart after a week and the unit ended up on the highway and ran over.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The head set works better than a Bluetooth shark audio one i had since several years ago. I mainly use the head set just to listen to music or hear directions when using google maps on the motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ONLY works between two Headsets
customer_reviews.text: Was told this would work with 3 headsets, but that is incorrect. If you are looking to communicate with more than 3 riders at a time, don't buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: UKFan4Sure!

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as the most expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: They work great I can keep talking with out holding a button, I got them for safety, my daughter and I go to the desert for riding and I can let her now what’s ahead of us or if somebody coming are way. I don’t have to yell anymore
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Weatherproof and reliable. Good sound quality and min excess background noise with the microphone
customer_reviews.author: harrisburg

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: Buttons took a few trips to get used to. Does what it says, but we got a tad over a mile with them. Getting one more for the car.. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Install and setup was very easy. There is a radio option that kind of sucks, but I didn't get these for the radio. Helmet to helmet is clear and so are phone conversations. Will be getting these for my other helmets as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made dirt bike riding with my son much more fun.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Got them for $89, it looks like they keep going up in price. They have a real-world range of about 1000'.
customer_reviews.author: Szilvia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Much louder than sena ones that I had and half the price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: john lafitte

customer_reviews.title: Good but for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product. headphones weren’t in the best condition when I received them. Seemed like they had a short. left side speakers cracks a bit. When listening to music. But overall the function of the Bluetooth is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Eric jayjohn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money 100 percent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality if you have the right helmet. I had a helmet that was a little big which make the sound quality have no bass. But once I purchased a fitted correct helmet the sound quality is amazing and for a cheap price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product. These changed our whole riding experience. Well worth the money for two riders.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line sound with easy pairing!
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth ROCKS! The clarity and volume of the sound comes through great over my Harley pipes and surrounding noise. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: MTcabinfever

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price!! Its actually really loud at a mid volume. Not so much bass but overall sounds awesome while riding. I havnt tried the call yet but with music it sounds great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: baha shaker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: 1st downfall, the sticky mount for the device itself, wasn't sticky at all. 2nd the speakers are too thick, wasn't uncomfortable inside the helmet 3rd low speaker quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good headset. Priced well.
customer_reviews.text: Havent tried the intercom. But easy install. Very loud speakers... people ask if I'm on my bike. I say yes. They say dont sound like it.. Wish it did use regular micro usb charger though....
customer_reviews.author: J. McBee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great battery life!
customer_reviews.text: We can hear each other as if we were listening to the radio in a car. Battery life lasts quite awhile too! Pairing them is easy, just need patience!
customer_reviews.author: Lou H.

customer_reviews.title: Installation is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing the buttons are easy to find. The sound quality is great. It syncs easily. For this price it is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! We get about a half mile open air range. Couldn’t be happier with the value.
customer_reviews.author: shawn tuele

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We have been using for a month. My son and I like them and easy to pair
customer_reviews.author: reaper

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend if you have a Harley this is a Reasonably Priced Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product Loud and Clear and I Have loud pipes and a Stereo And Still Clear
customer_reviews.author: Tremaine Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality at high speeds suck. The voice coming through the speakers is really garbled. Wish it was voice activated.
customer_reviews.author: lester oestreich

customer_reviews.title: Work fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to communicate with my grandson while riding the atv.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good headset !
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good headset. Very easy to install to the helmet. The sound is clear and loud to listen while I am riding on the highway. I brought two of them and installed to both helmets. So, I have the way better to talk to my friends who ride with me. Listening music and answering the phone work for this headset as well. Love it so much .
customer_reviews.author: kyle leung

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dang nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that the headphones on this set defy the price...they are very clear and crisp....easy to set up...really like this intercom set...had to super glue the speaker to the velcro, but mo biggie...really happy biker!
customer_reviews.author: Lief Erickson

customer_reviews.title: It was a purchase for my partner who oftenly ride with me
customer_reviews.text: It was a purchase for my partner who oftenly ride with me. It's a nice looking headset that's affortable and working as described. We could communication while in highway and can hear each other without much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kilyg

product_meta.title: ALLROS T10 Bluetooth 3.0 Motorcycle Helmet Intercom Wireless Communication Headset Supports up to 3 Riders Hands-Free Group Call Communication for Motorbike Bike ATV Car Skiing (2 Headsets)
product_meta.description:
Supports 3-rider communication :
The T10 Bluetooth 3.0 wireless motorcycle helmet intercom is your best communication solution when riding motorcycles, ATVs or driving cars. Intercoms facilitate communication between riders or between the rider and the rear seat. With its high-definition speakers and low-noise headphones, it offers better audio for a fluent conversation. Ideal for motorcycles, skiing, snowmobiling, mountain climbing, etc. Connect up to 3 intercoms (only 2 riders can communicate simultaneously).

Long-distance hand-free communication :
The CSR chip provides a long-range capability of up to 1200 meters or 1312 yards in an open terrain and a crystal clear communication without interferences within 500 meters or 546 yards. Easily pair your intercom with smartphones or other intercom’s brands to make or take calls from your mobile phone as long as the Bluetooth connection is on and well paired up. You can also listen to radio music, and even receive navigation instructions from your GPS device.

Product specifications :
Bluetooth 3.0 Support: HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP, AGHSP
Battery: Lithium 650mAh, 3.7V, 2.405Wh
Working time: 12 hours non-stop
Standby time: 300 hours
Charging time: 3 hours
Dimensions: 3.34 x 1.65 x 0.9 inches (85 x 42 x 23 mm)
Net weight: 1.67 oz. (47.5 g)

Package content :
1 x T10 Bluetooth walkie-talkie
1 x USB charging cable
1 x speaker
2 x microphones
1 x clip
1 x 3M pad
1 x user manual
feature_bullets: 3-RIDER COMMUNICATION: connect up to 3 intercoms for group communications (only 2 riders can communicate simultaneously) with the Bluetooth 3.0 Helmet intercom; this package includes 2 headsets
LONG-RANGE CONNECTION: the built-in CSR chip allows a crystal-clear sound within 546 yards distance and good communication up to 1312 yards in an open terrain (you might encounter some interferences)
HANDS-FREE CALLS: when your phone is sync you can answer, end, reject and call; thanks to the stereo button which is convex and 3D, you can easily push the buttons with your gloves

HELMET COMPATIBILITY: includes 2 different types of microphones to fit most full-face, convertible and open-face helmets; no exposed wires; can also pair with walkie-talkies (you need a K plug, not included)
WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF: IPX6 waterproof rating handles all weather conditions; professional windproof technology can effectively reduce noise

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
